titleStmt.title: A newe ballade intytuled, Good fellowes must go learne to daunce

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete at the signe of the Faucon, by Wylliam Gryffith, and are to be solde at his shoppe in S. Dunstones Churchyeard,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Good fellowes must go learne to daunce,".
2nd ballad begins: "A dewe sweete harte, a dewe".
Imperfect; leaf torn, affecting text of second ballad.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shoppe in S. Dunstones Churchyeard
